CHECKER_SUCCESS: O ji mma! Ị gara nke ọma.
FIRST_LESSON_MESSAGE: Ị nọ ugbu a na-ele ihe ọmụmụ mbụ n’ime modul a.
COURSE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE: Nnọọ! Ị mechara ihe ọmụmụ niile n’ime modul a.
JS_BEGINNER_DESC: Mụta JavaScript site na ntọala ruo ọkwa dị elu — nwayọ nwayọ, tinyere ihe mgbatị ụtọ!
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_DESC:
Nkuzi Isi JavaScript
JavaScript bụ asụsụ mmemme e ji eme ka kọmputa na-arụ ọrụ anyị chọrọ.

1. Ederede Nzuzọ (Comments) Ị chọọ ka kọmputa hapụ otu ahịrị, jiri //. 
// Comment na-amalite na //
// Kọmputa anaghị arụ ọrụ ihe ọ bụla malitere na //
// Nke a bụ naanị ka ị kọwaa ihe koodu gị na-eme

2. Igosi Okwu ma ọ bụ Nọmba Iji mee ka kọmputa gosi okwu, jiri console.log():
console.log("Welcome")
Iji gosi nọmba:
console.log(100)

3. Variables Iji chekwaa okwu ma ọ bụ nọmba, jiri let:
let name = "Ali";
let age = 20;

4. Functions Function a na-agbakwunye nọmba abụọ:
function add(a, b) {
   return a + b;
}
Iji kpọọ function ahụ:
let result = add(x, y);

5. Condition Statements Ihe atụ eji if na else:
let a = 20;
let b = 2;

if (a > b) {
   console.log("a ka ukwuu karịa b")
} else {
    console.log("a pere mpe karịa b")
}

6. Arrays Iji chekwaa ọtụtụ ihe ọnụ, jiri array:
let myeggs = [];
Na uru mbụ:
let ages = [10, 22];
let shelf = ["akwụkwọ", "fruit", "bottle"];
Ịnweta uru:
console.log(ages[1]); // 10
console.log(shelf[2]); // bottle
Length property:
console.log(myeggs.length);
console.log(shelf.length);

7. Loops Iji mee otu ihe ugboro ugboro, jiri for...of loop:
for (let drawer of shelf) {
    console.log(drawer);
}

JavaScript bụ asụsụ na-etolite mgbe niile, ma juputara na atụmatụ ị ga-amụta n’ime nkuzi na-abịa.
N’ime nkuzi a, ị mụtara ihe JavaScript bụ na ntụziaka zuru oke banyere ya.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_INITIAL:
// Pịa RUN ka ị malite
console.log('Begin')
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_SOLUTION:
// Pịa RUN ka ị malite
console.log('Begin')

AJMJS_BEGINNER_DESC: Mụta DialectScript site na efu ruo ọkwa dike — nkeji nkeji, yana ihe ịma aka ndị na-atọ ụtọ!
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_DESC:
Nkuzi Izizi DialectScript
DialectScript bụ asụsụ mmemme nke na-enye gị ohere ịhazi kọmputa.

◉ Nkwupụta (Comments) Iji mee ka kọmputa detuo ihe, jiri //.
// Nkwupụta na-amalite na //
// Kọmputa anaghị eme ihe ọ bụla bidoro na //
// Nke a bụ naanị maka gị ka ị kọwaa ihe koodu gị na-eme

◉ Igosi Edemede na Ọnụọgụgụ Iji mee ka kọmputa gosi edemede, jiri ziputa():
ziputa("Sannu da zuwa")
Iji gosi ọnụọgụgụ:
ziputa(100)

◉ Ọdịiche (Variables) Iji chekwa edemede ma ọ bụ ọnụọgụgụ, jiri agbanwe:
agbanwe aha = "Ali;
agbanwe afọ = 20;

◉ Ọrụ (Functions) Ọrụ a na-agbakọ ọnụọgụgụ abụọ:
aiki gbakọọ(a, b) {
   return a + b;
}
Iji kpọọ ọrụ ahụ:
agbanwe nsonye = gbakọọ(x, y);

◉ Okwu Ọnọdụ (Conditional Statements) Ihe atụ site na iji oburuna na maobughi:
idan (a > b) {
   ziputa("a karịrị b")
} maobughi {
   ziputa("a pere mpe karịa b")
}

◉ Nchịkọta (Arrays) Iji chekwa ọtụtụ ihe, jiri nchịkọta:
agbanwe àkwá = [];
Site na ụkpụrụ mbido:
agbanwe afọ = [10, 22];
agbanwe shelf = ["akwụkwọ", "mkpụrụ osisi", "karama"];
Inweta ụkpụrụ:
ziputa(afọ[1]); // 22
Ogologo nchịkọta:
ziputa(àkwá.ogologo);
ziputa(shelf.ogologo);

◉ Akaghị (Loops) Imegharị ihe ugboro ugboro site na maka..kowane:
maka (agbanwe ihe kowane shelf) {
    ziputa(ihe);
}

DialectScript bụ asụsụ na-etolite etolite nke nwere ọtụtụ atụmatụ ị ga-amụta n’ọdịnihu.
Na nkuzi a, ị mụtala ihe DialectScript bụ ma nweta nleba anya zuru oke banyere ya.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_INITIAL:
// Pịa RUN ka ị malite
ziputa('Bido')
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_SOLUTION:
// Pịa RUN ka ị malite
ziputa('Bido')
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_DESC: Mee ka kọmputa kelee onye ọrụ site na igosi 'Hello'.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_DESC: Mee ka kọmputa gosi aha ya.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_DESC: Chekwaa aha na afọ kọmputa n’ime mgbanwe.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_DESC: Chekwaa ihe n’ime kaboodu ụlọ, kaboodu kichin, na kọntaktị.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_DESC: Gwa kọmputa ka o tulee afọ ya na nke gị wee gosi ozi.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_DESC: Mee ka kọmputa kwuo aha ya ugboro ise site na akaghị.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_TITLE: Gosi Ihe Ndị Dị na Kaboodu
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_DESC: Mee ka kọmputa gosi ihe niile dị na kaboodu ụlọ site na akaghị.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_8_DESC: Gosi ọnụọgụ ihe dị na kaboodu ọ bụla na kọntaktị.
